headline: A ‘Minimalist’ Budget As de Blasio Warns Of Possible State Cuts
abstract: The mayor proposed a city budget with the smallest percentage increase in his six years in office, fearing a state deficit.
lead_paragraph: The divide between Mayor Bill de Blasio and Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has colored many city vs. state squabbles, seeping into disputes over subway repairs, school funding and solving the homelessness crisis.
